data.title: Famous artists who started their careers at BRIT school
data.meta_description: Take a look at the BRIT school's famous alumni, including Adele, Freya Ridings, and Amy Winehouse. Some have even gone on to win BRIT Awards too.
data.text:
These stars attended the prestigious BRIT school

The BRIT Awards 2024 with Mastercard took place on Saturday 2nd March this year, and it's safe to say it served up some huge moments, with lots of amazing winners and performances.

After RAYE broke BRIT records by winning a huge six awards at the 2024 ceremony, we thought we'd take a look at some of the super popular musicians who started their music career at the prestigious BRIT school, just like RAYE.

From 2007 BRIT Award Critics' Choice winner, 'Hello' and 'Easy On Me' pop star Adele, to 'Weekends' singer Freya Ridings - they all started out at the same school!

Check out these pop stars who attended BRIT school:

Now read:

The BRIT Awards 2024: Winners revealed

The best bits from The BRIT Awards 2024

All of the amazing performances from The BRIT Awards 2024

How to listen to KISS:

Listen to KISS, KISSTORY and KISS Fresh on our free Rayo app, by hitting the play button on the bottom of your screen and on your smart speaker (‘Play KISS FM’, ‘Play KISSTORY’, ‘Play KISS Fresh’). KISS and KISSTORY are also available on DAB.
